name: Agamotto (Image Sequence)
description: Slider-based image sequence viewer. Ideal for showing processes, transformations, and gradual changes.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate a sequence of related images with descriptions

images.description: string - Description of this image (for AI generation)
images.label: string - Label for this step
images.text: string - Explanatory text for this step

images.description: A seed just planted in soil with a small sprout emerging
images.label: Week 1
images.text: The seed absorbs water and begins to germinate. A small root emerges first.

images.description: A small seedling with two leaves above the soil
images.label: Week 2
images.text: The stem pushes through the soil and the first leaves (cotyledons) appear.

images.description: A young plant with several leaves and a visible stem
images.label: Week 4
images.text: True leaves develop and the plant begins photosynthesis more actively.

images.description: A mature flowering plant with blossoms
images.label: Week 8
images.text: The plant reaches maturity and produces flowers for reproduction.

items.description: The seed absorbs water and begins to germinate. A small root emerges first.
The stem pushes through the soil and the first leaves (cotyledons) appear.

conversion_notes.sequence_order: Images should be in logical sequence order
conversion_notes.image_consistency: All images should have similar framing/perspective
